ComicInfo.Summary:
Over millennia, Brigid, Goddess of the Sun, has conquered and converted the entire solar system into worshipping her and her alone, save one space colony. The witches of Fey are the last believers of The Morrigan, Goddess of Death, Brigid's sister and the only other God left. As Brigid's forces prepare for one final battle, The Morrigan prepares to do what she does best: Destroy!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Liana Kangas | 1, 6-7 | B | Cover B | Nathan Gooden & Tim Daniel | 8 | Var | Tour Edition Variant Cover | ? | Missing | RE | Forbidden Planet / Jetpack Comics Exclusive Variant Cover (Limited to 250 copies) | Paul Azaceta | 5 | RE | Unknown Comics Exclusive Blue Variant Cover (Limited to 250 copies) | Creees Hyunsung Lee | 3 | RE | Unknown Comics Exclusive Red Variant Cover (Limited to 250 copies) | Creees Hyunsung Lee | 4 | Note: Cover B is a homage to Fiona Staples' cover of Saga #8 (2012).
